channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The skyrocketing cost of health care is creating ‘a new type of pandemic,’ health VC says
item.description: “When you can’t afford health care, you’re not buying your prescriptions, you’re delaying the delivery of care, you’re not making appointments… it’s a massive problem,” Lee Shapiro said.

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Wednesday
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: Mortgage rates drop to seven-week low
America’s productivity growth is recovering to pre-Great Financial Crisis rates. Europe has more work to do
item.description: By stepping up the pace of investment and technological innovation, it is possible to leave the era of stagnation behind.

item.title: Autos giant Peugeot is trialing driverless tech — with a twist — for Amazon-style deliveries
item.description: French car giant Peugeot told CNBC it has partnered with German startup Vay to test the use of "teledriving" technology.

item.title: Target's stock dives after profit misses expectations
Biden administration is cancelling $7.7bn more in federal student loans for 160,000 borrowers
item.description: The latest relief will go to borrowers in three categories who hit certain milestones that make them eligible for cancellation.

item.title: CFPB says buy now, pay later firms must comply with U.S. credit card laws
item.description: The buy now, pay later market is dominated by fintech firms like Affirm, Klarna and PayPal.

item.title: Japan's key bond yield above 1% for the first time in 11 years
Women get dismissed by doctors—and it’s led to devastating consequences for cancer, says the OB/GYN Olivia Munn credits with saving her life
item.description: “Our complaints are dismissed…every time we open our mouths,” she said.

item.title: Weekly mortgage refinance demand revives as interest rates fall to 7-week low
item.description: Total mortgage application volume rose 1.9% compared to the previous week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association's seasonally adjusted index.

item.title: Oaktree has taken over Inter Milan after loan wasn't repaid
The Welsh island of Anglesey set to house the U.K.’s next large nuclear power station
item.description: So far there's only large-scale plant under construction in the country, with another still working to get financing.

item.title: AI will power the stock market for the next decade, former Cisco CEO says
item.description: Artificial intelligence will power the stock market for the next decade, according to former Cisco CEO John Chambers.

item.title: Hedge funds have rotated away from Mag 7 stocks into other AI winners
